decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to the commencement of any development above ground level, detailed drawings (plan, elevation, section) to be provided on the design of the railing  and gates (electronic gates and pedestrian gate) at a minimum scale of 1:10, and manufacturer's specification  shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authorityThe development shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The works shall be carried out and maintained in accordance with the deposited Fire Statement compliant with Policy D12(A) and submitted and approved application drawings .Reason: In the interests of fire safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire Safety) of the London Plan 2021.
description: Installation of 2nos electric gates and 1no pedestrian gate. Erection of metal rails between the brick piers. Amendment to an existing perimeter wall and landscaping.
